gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.actions
Class DefaultSaveAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.actions.AbstractContextAction
          gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.actions.DefaultSaveAsAction
              gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.actions.DefaultSaveAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class DefaultSaveAction
extends DefaultSaveAsAction

This class defines a default implementation of Save action. The primary focus of this class is to provide consistent look and feel definition to SaveObjectToDbMapAction across the system. Please see SaveObjectToDbMapAction defined in ui.map.actions for some reference.

Since:
CMTS v1.0
See Also:
